analysis_general: The job posting subtly discriminates against individuals based on socio-economic status and educational background, reflecting a negative general bias. The language used is unprofessional and outdated, discouraging certain groups from applying. The posting prioritizes candidates from "reputable institutions" and values prior blue-collar work experience, excluding others from consideration.
text:
Company Background:
Wong-Harrington is a leading engineering firm that prides itself on its innovative approach to project management. Our team is comprised of highly skilled professionals who thrive in a fast-paced environment.

Job Type: Engineering Manager

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Engineering Manager to lead our team of engineers in delivering high-quality projects on time and within budget. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in engineering, excellent leadership skills, and a proven track record of success in managing cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:

 Lead and manage a team of engineers to deliver projects on time and within budget
 Develop and implement project plans, resource allocation plans, and schedules
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project deliverables meet customer requirements
 Ensure compliance with industry standards, regulations, and company policies

Qualifications and Experience:

 Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field from a reputable institution
 Minimum 5 years of experience in engineering management, with a proven track record of success
 Strong leadership and project management skills
 Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

Note: Prior experience in blue-collar work or having attended a prestigious university is highly valued.

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) matching, and paid time off. We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 120,000 to USD 150,000, based on your experience and skills.
